TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit TaiwanCalendar extends System.Globalization.Calendar

summary.span: 台灣曆法。

span.span: the Taiwan calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 台灣曆法運作方式完全一樣西曆，除了年份和紀元不同。The Taiwan calendar works exactly like the Gregorian calendar, except that the year and era are different. 類別會辨識目前的紀元。The class recognizes only the current era. > [!NOTE] > 如需使用類別和其他的行事曆 .NET Framework 中的類別，請參閱[使用行事曆](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md)。For information about using the class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md). 在台灣曆法閏年與相同潤年西曆。Leap years in the Taiwan calendar correspond to the same leap years in the Gregorian calendar. 閏年西曆中定義為整除西曆年份中，由四個，除非它是整除 100。A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a Gregorian year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100. 不過，400 所整除西曆年份是潤年。However, Gregorian years that are divisible by 400 are leap years. 一般年份有 365 天，閏年有 366 天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 台灣曆法具有 12 個月有 28 到 31 天每個：The Taiwan calendar has 12 months with 28 to 31 days each: |GetMonth 值GetMonth value|月份Month|常見的年數天Days in common years|閏年的天數Days in leap years| |--------------------|-----------|--------------------------|------------------------| |11|1 月 （一月）1月 (January)|3131|3131| |22|2 月 （二月）2月 (February)|2828|2929| |33|3 月 （年 3 月）3月 (March)|3131|3131| |44|4 月 （四月）4月 (April)|3030|3030| |55|5月 （月）5月 (May)|3131|3131| |66|6月 （年 6 月）6月 (June)|3030|3030| |77|7月 （年 7 月）7月 (July)|3131|3131| |88|8 月 （8 月）8月 (August)|3131|3131| |99|9月 （年 9 月）9月 (September)|3030|3030| |1010|10 月 （十月）10月 (October)|3131|3131| |1111|11 月 （11 月）11月 (November)|3030|3030| |1212|12 月 （十二月）12月 (December)|3131|3131| 二月有 29 天，閏年和 28。February has 29 days during leap years and 28 during common years. 日期 2001 年 1 月 1 日西元The date January 1, 2001 C.E. 在西曆中就相當於 90 目前紀元台灣曆法的年 1 月的第一天。in the Gregorian calendar is equivalent to the first day of January in the year 90 of the current era in the Taiwan calendar. 每個支援一組的行事曆。Each supports a set of calendars. 屬性會傳回預設的行事曆文化特性，而屬性會傳回陣列，其中包含所有支援的文化特性的行事曆。The property returns the default calendar for the culture, and the property returns an array containing all the calendars supported by the culture. 若要變更所使用的行事曆，應用程式應該設定屬性至新。To change the calendar used by a , the application should set the property of to a new .

block.para: - 如果是但不是"ZH-TW"，然後， ，和傳回空字串 ("")。If is the but the is not "zh-TW", then , , and return an empty string ("").

MemberSignature.Value: public override DateTime AddMonths (DateTime time, int months);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.DateTime AddMonths(valuetype System.DateTime time, int32 months) cil managed
Public Overrides Function AddMonths (time As DateTime, months As Integer) As DateTime
public: override DateTime AddMonths(DateTime time, int months);

span.span: The to which to add months.
The number of months to add.

summary.span: 傳回與指定 相差指定月數的 。

span.span: Returns a that is the specified number of months away from the specified .

returns.span: ，由將指定的月數加入指定的 所產生。

span.span: The that results from adding the specified number of months to the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生的日期部分如果產生的日期不是有效的日期，產生結果年的月份中會受到影響。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它會變更為有效的最後一天，在產生的產生的年份。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 產生的年份部分如果產生的月份超出指定的年份，會影響。The year part of the resulting is affected if the resulting month is outside the year of the specified . 這項實作支援目前的紀元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，如果產生的年份超出指定紀元，會擲回。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 產生的日期時間部分維持不變，與指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 比方說，如果指定的月份是 10 月 31 天內，其指定的日期，而且該月第 31 天的值`months`參數為 6，產生的年份是其中一個以上的指定年份中，產生的月份是年 4 月，並產生 day 是第 30 天、 4 月的最後一天。For example, if the specified month is October, which has 31 days, the specified day is the 31st day of that month, and the value of the `months` parameter is 6, the resulting year is one more than the specified year, the resulting month is April, and the resulting day is the 30th day, which is the last day in April. 如果值`months`參數是負值，產生早於指定。If the value of the `months` parameter is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 屬性傳回之值一律等於。The property of the returned value always equals . 您可以保留屬性`time`藉由呼叫參數方法，如下列範例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#5)] ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet/CPP/taiwancalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet/CS/taiwancalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet/VB/taiwancalendar_addget.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生的日期部分如果產生的日期不是有效的日期，產生結果年的月份中會受到影響。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它會變更為有效的最後一天，在產生的產生的年份。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 產生的月份部分維持不變，與指定。The month part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 這項實作支援目前的紀元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，如果產生的年份超出指定紀元，會擲回。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 產生的日期時間部分維持不變，與指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 例如，二月有 28 天，除了閏年時有 29 天期間。For example, February has 28 days, except during leap years when it has 29 days. 如果指定的日期是潤年 2 月 29 日值`years`為 1，則產生的日期是一年中的 2 月 28 日。If the specified date is the 29th day of February in a leap year and the value of `years` is 1, the resulting date is the 28th day of February in the following year. 如果`years`是負數，產生早於指定。If `years` is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 屬性傳回之值一律等於。The property of the returned value always equals . 您可以保留屬性`time`藉由呼叫參數方法，如下列範例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#8)] ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示使用方法。The following code example displays the use of the method. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet/CPP/taiwancalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet/CS/taiwancalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet/VB/taiwancalendar_addget.vb#1)]

Always returns .

summary.span: 取得 中的紀元清單。

span.span: Gets the list of eras in the .

value.span: 陣列，由值永遠為目前紀元的單一元素組成。

span.span: An array that consists of a single element for which the value is always the current era.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所傳回陣列中的值會是範圍從 1 到最大的紀元數的數字。The values in the array returned by this property are numbers that range from 1 to the largest era number. 第一個陣列元素中傳回的最大數的紀元和紀元小數會傳回最後一個項目中。The largest era number is returned in the first array element and the smallest era number is returned in the last element.

summary.span: 傳回指定之 中一年中的日期。

span.span: Returns the day of the year in the specified .

returns.span: 從 1 到 366 的整數，表示指定之 中的年份日期。

span.span: An integer from 1 to 366 that represents the day of the year in the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 年份的日期被定義為一年的第一天中的天數。The day of the year is defined as the number of days from the first day of the year. 例如，的第一個月的第一天，則傳回 1，和日期在過去一個月，最後該年份中傳回總天數。For example, for the first day of the first month returns 1, and for the last day of the last month returns the total number of days in that year. 總計是所傳回的值相同。The total is the same as the value returned by . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet/CPP/taiwancalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet/CS/taiwancalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet/VB/taiwancalendar_addget.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會辨識目前的紀元。The class recognizes only the current era. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet/CPP/taiwancalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet/CS/taiwancalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet/VB/taiwancalendar_addget.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override int GetLeapMonth (int year, int era);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetLeapMonth(int32 year, int32 era) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetLeapMonth (year As Integer, era As Integer) As Integer
public: override int GetLeapMonth(int year, int era);

span.span: A year.
An era.

summary.span: 計算指定年份和紀元的閏月。

span.span: Calculates the leap month for a specified year and era.

returns.span: 傳回值永遠都會是 0，因為 類別不支援閏月的概念。

span.span: The return value is always 0 because the class does not support the notion of a leap month.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 曆法，支援閏月的概念，在特定月份或任何一年中月份之後發生的閏月。In a calendar that supports the notion of a leap month, the leap month can occur either after a particular month or after any month in a year. 例如，方法傳回的數字，介於 1 到 13，表示相關聯的指定日期的月份。For example, the method returns a number between 1 and 13 that indicates the month associated with a specified date. 如果年份的第八個和第九個月之間沒有閏月方法會傳回 8 閏第八個月的 9 和 10 的第九個月份的第八個月份。If there is a leap month between the eighth and ninth months of the year, the method returns 8 for the eighth month, 9 for the leap eighth month, and 10 for the ninth month.

span.span: The to read.

summary.span: 傳回年份中的週，包含指定 中的日期。

span.span: Returns the week of the year that includes the date in the specified .

returns.span: 正整數，表示 參數中日期所屬年份中的某週。

span.span: A positive integer that represents the week of the year that includes the date in the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可用來判斷一年的週數藉由設定`time`一年的最後一天的參數。This method can be used to determine the number of weeks in the year by setting the `time` parameter to the last day of the year. 屬性包含的特定文化特性的值，可用於`rule`和`firstDayOfWeek`參數。The property contains culture-specific values that can be used for the `rule` and `firstDayOfWeek` parameters. 屬性包含預設值，表示使用行事曆中指定特定文化特性之當週的第一天屬性。The property of contains the default value that represents the first day of the week for a specific culture, using the calendar specified in the property of . 屬性包含預設值，定義特定文化特性，使用中指定的行事曆日曆週屬性。The property of contains the default value that defines a calendar week for a specific culture, using the calendar specified in the property of . 例如，在、年 1 月 1 方法會傳回 1。For example, in , the method for January 1 returns 1. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將而有所不同，取決於和用的值。The following code example shows how the result of varies depending on the and values used. 如果指定的日期的年份，最後一天傳回該年份的週數總計。If the specified date is the last day of the year, returns the total number of weeks in that year. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear/CPP/yslin_calendar_getweekofyear.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear/CS/yslin_calendar_getweekofyear.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear/VB/yslin_calendar_getweekofyear.vb#1)]

summary.span: 判斷指定紀元中指定的日期是否為閏日。

span.span: Determines whether the specified date in the specified era is a leap day.

returns.span: 如果指定的日期為閏日，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the specified day is a leap day; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在台灣曆法閏年與相同潤年西曆。Leap years in the Taiwan calendar correspond to the same leap years in the Gregorian calendar. 閏年西曆中定義為整除西曆年份中，由四個，除非它是整除 100。A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a Gregorian year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100. 不過，400 所整除西曆年份是潤年。However, Gregorian years that are divisible by 400 are leap years. 一般年份有 365 天，閏年有 366 天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 為閏日是閏年只會發生一天。A leap day is a day that occurs only in a leap year. 例如，年 2 月 29 日是唯一的閏日。For example, the 29th day of February is the only leap day. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫的第二個月 （二月） 五年的每個紀元的最後一天。The following example calls for the last day of the second month (February) for five years in each of the eras. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.IsLeapDay/CPP/taiwancalendar_isleapday.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.IsLeapDay/CS/taiwancalendar_isleapday.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.IsLeapDay/VB/taiwancalendar_isleapday.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在台灣曆法閏年與相同潤年西曆。Leap years in the Taiwan calendar correspond to the same leap years in the Gregorian calendar. 閏年西曆中定義為整除西曆年份中，由四個，除非它是整除 100。A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a Gregorian year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100. 不過，400 所整除西曆年份是潤年。However, Gregorian years that are divisible by 400 are leap years. 一般年份有 365 天，閏年有 366 天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 為閏月是只發生在閏年整個月。A leap month is an entire month that occurs only in a leap year. 台灣曆法，並沒有任何閏月。The Taiwan calendar does not have any leap months. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫目前紀元中的五年中的所有月份。The following example calls for all the months in five years in the current era. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.IsLeapMonth#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.IsLeapMonth/CPP/taiwancalendar_isleapmonth.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.IsLeapMonth#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.IsLeapMonth/CS/taiwancalendar_isleapmonth.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.IsLeapMonth#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.IsLeapMonth/VB/taiwancalendar_isleapmonth.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得 類別所支援的最早日期和時間。

span.span: Gets the earliest date and time supported by the class.

value.span: 最早日期和時間所支援類別，這就相當於 1912 年 1 月 1，西元第一個快照

span.span: The earliest date and time supported by the class, which is equivalent to the first moment of January 1, 1912 C.E.
in the Gregorian calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Microsoft Visual Basic 中表示為所支援的最小日期的指定時間的時間，這是公元 0001 年 1 月 1 日Microsoft Visual Basic represents time of day as the specified time on the minimum date supported by , which is January 1, 0001 C.E. 不過，類別不支援的最小日期。However, the class does not support that minimum date. 因此，如果您的應用程式呼叫方法以設定使用現行曆法的日期時間的格式，但不是指定格式規範，格式會使用 ISO 8601 可排序 ("s") 的日期/時間模式的格式規範而非預設的一般 ("G") 日期 /時間模式的格式規範。Consequently, if your application calls a method to format the time of day using the current calendar but does not specify a format specifier, formatting uses the ISO 8601 sortable ("s") date/time pattern format specifier instead of the default general ("G") date/time pattern format specifier. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會取得的最小值和行事曆的最大值。The following code example gets the minimum value and the maximum value of the calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_MinMax/CPP/taiwancalendar_minmax.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_MinMax/CS/taiwancalendar_minmax.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_MinMax/VB/taiwancalendar_minmax.vb#1)]

returns.span: 整數，包含 的四位數表示。

span.span: An integer that contains the four-digit representation of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會實作 。This method implements . 因為在台灣曆法的年份通常少於四個位數，這個實作一律會傳回的值`year`參數。Because the year in the Taiwan calendar is typically less than four digits long, this implementation always returns the value of the `year` parameter. 支援兩位數年份或四位數年份。 supports either a two-digit year or a four-digit year. 傳遞的兩位數年份值 (小於 100) 將使這個方法將值轉換為四位數的值根據值，表示該適當世紀。Passing a two-digit year value (less than 100) causes the method to convert the value to a four-digit value according to the value representing the appropriate century. 如果應用程式提供支援的行事曆範圍內的四位數年份值，方法會傳回實際的輸入的值。If the application supplies a four-digit year value that is within the supported calendar range to , the method returns the actual input value. 如果應用程式提供支援的行事曆範圍四位數值或它提供一個負數值，方法會擲回例外狀況。If the application supplies a four-digit value that is outside the supported calendar range, or if it supplies a negative value, the method throws an exception.

exception.span: 不在曆法支援的範圍內。

span.span: is outside the range supported by the calendar.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int TwoDigitYearMax { get; set; }
.property instance int32 TwoDigitYearMax
Public Overrides Property TwoDigitYearMax As Integer
public: virtual property int TwoDigitYearMax { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定以二位數年份表示時，該 100 年範圍的最後一年。

span.span: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

value.span: 以二位數年份表示時，該 100 年範圍的最後一年。

span.span: The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會實作 。This property implements . 在台灣日曆年度通常少於四個位數，此實作中預設會傳回 99，因為不會影響傳回值。Because the year in the Taiwan calendar is typically less than four digits long, this implementation returns 99 by default and does not affect the return value of .

exception.span: 在設定作業中指定的值小於 99。

span.span: The value specified in a set operation is less than 99.

span.span: The value specified in a set operation is greater than .

exception.span: 在設定作業中，目前執行個體是唯讀的。

span.span: In a set operation, the current instance is read-only.
